roleset.name: cause to be grateful, suck up to

example.name: toady?
example.text: ``It's not uncommon for [these guys]-3 to send pictures of themselves or their families [*-3]to ingratiate themselves to their clients,'' says Terree Bowers, chief of the major-frauds section of the U.S. attorney's office in Los Angeles.

roleset.note: INGRATIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ingratiate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from ingratiate.01-v predicate notes)
